thread.title: Las Vegans, former Rebels in the hunt at Shriners Open — LIVE BLOG
thread.title_full: Las Vegans, former Rebels in the hunt at Shriners Open — LIVE BLOG | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: Chris Kudialis
title: Las Vegans, former Rebels in the hunt at Shriners Open — LIVE BLOG
text:
The third round of the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open continues Saturday, with former UNLV Rebel Chad Campbell and Henderson resident Nick Watney in the hunt. Summerlin resident Kevin Na, Bonanza High School grad Scott Piercy and former UNLV star Ryan Moore are also within striking distance of leader Morgan Hoffmann.
 Stegmaier clocks in early,... Hole of the day: Shriners...
